wordcram

Class PlottingWordNudger

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordcram.PlottingWordNudger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WordNudger

    public class PlottingWordNudger
extends java.lang.Object
implements WordNudger
    If you're using a custom WordNudger, and having difficulty seeing how well it works, try wrapping it in a PlottingWordNudger. As your WordCram is drawn, it'll render tiny dots at each location it nudges your words to, so you can see how well it's working.

    • Method Detail

      • nudgeFor

        public processing.core.PVector nudgeFor(Word word,
                               int attempt)
        Description copied from interface: WordNudger
        How should this word be nudged, this time?
        Specified by:
        nudgeFor in interface WordNudger
        Parameters:
        word - the word to nudge
        attempt - how many times WordCram has tried to place this word; starts at zero, and ends at (int)((1.0-word.weight) * 600) + 100
        Returns:
        the PVector to add to the word's desired location, to get the next spot to try fitting the word
